## CapAccess type


**Signature:**

```typescript
export type CapAccess = [CapAccessType.Unrestricted] | {
    [CapAccessType.Transferable]: {
        secret: CapSecret;
    };
} | {
    [CapAccessType.Assigned]: {
        secret: CapSecret;
        assignees: AgentPubKey[];
    };
};
```
